content: evelyn clark designs estonian lace wrist warmers these wrist warmers are knit in the round using stitches adapted from the estonian lace book pitsilised koekirjad by leili reimann purl stitches between the ribbons of lace ensure a close fit and they knit up quickly in fingering weight yarns this design originally appeared in the nordic heritage museum s nordic knits booklet skills
